title: Hand & Wrist Pain Regenerative Programme
description: Precision orthobiologics and stabilising rehab for arthritis, TFCC tears, carpal instability, and repetitive strain.
longDescription: Typing, lifting, parenting, or sport can flare delicate wrist structures. Our regenerative programme blends ultrasound-guided PRP, adipose cells, or micro-tenotomy with splinting and dexterity training so pain fades, grip returns, and you can work or play without hesitation.

faq.question: How soon can I type or lift?
faq.answer: Light typing resumes next day with splint support. Strength work restarts gradually from week three.

faq.question: Will I need multiple sessions?
faq.answer: Many conditions respond to one session; chronic cases may need a booster at 8-12 weeks.
